application.name: xmldiff
application.description: This program will compare two XML files without regard to the order of child tags. The purpose of this program is for comparing PDS4 labels and nightly tests that may output an xml file with attributes in random order. It is designed to be order-invariant and will compare these files ignoring the order of xml attributes and ignoring any spacing that may occur in the files.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The first file to be compared against.

parameter.name: FROM2
parameter.description: The second file to be compared against.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This will output the differences to a text file in Pvl format.

example.description: This example will cover how to do a basic difference between two xml files to ignore file spacing.
